headline.sub: Use of Genetics to Assess Risk Of Smokers Meets Skepticism ;

docs.lead_paragraph: Scaring people into quitting is the marketing rationale for a new genetic test, which purports to identify which smokers have the highest risk of developing lung cancer.
docs.snippet: Scaring people into quitting is the marketing rationale for a new genetic test, which purports to identify which smokers have the highest risk of developing lung cancer.

headline.print_headline: Firing Bullets of Data At Cozy Anti-Science
headline.seo: Michael Specter Fires Bullets of Data at Cozy Antiscience in ‘Denialism’
headline.main: Firing Bullets of Data at Cozy Anti-Science

docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Specter’s hotly argued diatribe targets those he thinks are emblems of stubbornly anti-scientific thinking, like Prince Charles, Dr. Andrew Weil and Whole Foods.
docs.snippet: Michael Specter’s hotly argued diatribe targets those he thinks are emblems of stubbornly anti-scientific thinking, like Prince Charles, Dr. Andrew Weil and Whole Foods.
